## Cookie.setExpires() method

Sets the 'Expires' attribute on a cookie.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setExpires(exp: string | Date): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

exp


</td><td>

string \| Date


</td><td>

the new value for the 'Expires' attribute of the cookie.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

When given a `string` value it will be parsed with [parseDate()](./tough-cookie.parsedate.md)<!-- -->. If the value can't be parsed as a cookie date then the 'Expires' attribute will be set to `"Infinity"`<!-- -->.
